price: N'iyo bashikiriwe n’inkebuzo, gushika n'aho bashikirwa n’ibihano bibabaza bakabibona ukuri kwamye, ico gihe bazoheza bakwemere, kandi ukwemera kwabo muri ico gihe, ata co kuzobamarira.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
